With an improved user interface, a convenient study guide and hundreds of peer-reviewed, ABIM-style self-assessment questions, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be able to identify knowledge gaps and target study to fill those gaps in preparation for the Board exam or to support your day-to-day clinical practice.

Use ACCSAP 8 to:
